title: Ticket #5063: Improve scalability of LSF status script
description:
Horst @ OU is experiencing an issue with his HTCondor CE + LSF setup because the lsf_status.sh script uses `find` to get the filenames for some logs: 

ulogs=`find $logpath -name $logeventfile.[0-9]* -maxdepth 1 -type f -newer $datefile -print 2>/dev/null`

This is putting Horst's CE under very heavy load with only a few jobs.
